description:
Hedgehog is the glowing girl`s companion and tool for executing her commands.
These (English) commands include:* "house" (= return to its master, used in situations when Hedgehog is in danger)
* "reboot" (= reset the memory of all beings within the virtual world of the target)
* "delete" (= remove the target from the current virtual world)
* "wipe out everything" (= destroy the virtual world)

"Harinezumi" (針鼠), meaning "hedgehog" or "porcupine", is http://anidb.net/ch19494 [Sugiura]`s nickname for this being whereas http://anidb.net/ch19491 [Mutsuki] uses the English word "hedgehog" (ヘッジホッグ).
name: Hedgehog
